## EU5 Valid Effects Reference
## Source: https://eu5.paradoxwikis.com/Effect + Vanilla Game Files
## Last Updated: December 4, 2025

‚ö†Ô∏è **IMPORTANT: Wiki is INCOMPLETE - Always verify against vanilla files!**

üìÅ **Key vanilla reference files:**
   - game/in_game/events/**/*.txt - All vanilla events with effect examples
   - game/in_game/common/scripted_effects/**/*.txt - Reusable effect blocks
   - game/main_menu/common/script_values/default_values.txt - All script value constants

üìÑ **Companion files:**
   - EU5_MODIFIERS_REFERENCE.txt - All valid modifiers
   - EU5_TRIGGERS_REFERENCE.txt - All valid triggers
   - SCRIPT_VALUES_RESEARCH.md - Complete script values documentation

======================
‚úÖ CRITICAL FINDINGS (Effects that exist but wiki doesn't document)
======================

RESEARCH & TECHNOLOGY ‚úÖ
----------------------------------
add_research_progress = <value>            # Add research points (uses script values) ‚úÖ CONFIRMED IN VANILLA
                                          # Values: research_progress_weak_bonus = 5, research_progress_moderate_bonus = 10, etc.
                                          # Found in: random_event.txt, laws.txt, flavor_*.txt
                                          
DISEASE & PLAGUE ‚úÖ
----------------------------------
spawn_disease = {                          # Spawn disease in location ‚úÖ CONFIRMED IN VANILLA
    disease = disease:bubonic_plague       # Disease type
    virulence = <0.0-1.0>                 # Spread rate (0.3 = quarantine, 0.5 = normal, 1.0 = severe)
}
                                          # Found in: flavor_IRO.txt, disease events
                                          
CULTURAL INFLUENCE ‚úÖ
----------------------------------
add_cultural_influence = <value>           # Add cultural influence to culture scope ‚úÖ CONFIRMED IN VANILLA
                                          # Must be used within culture:{} scope
                                          # Values: cultural_influence_moderate_bonus, cultural_influence_severe_penalty, etc.
                                          # Found in: 20+ vanilla event files
                                          
ARMY TRADITION ‚úÖ
----------------------------------
add_army_tradition = <value>               # Add army tradition ‚úÖ CONFIRMED IN VANILLA
                                          # Values: army_tradition_weak_bonus = 5, army_tradition_moderate_bonus = 10, etc.
                                          # REPLACES: add_army_professionalism (which doesn't exist in EU5)
                                          
SOCIETAL VALUES ‚úÖ
----------------------------------
change_societal_value = {                  # Change societal value position ‚úÖ CONFIRMED IN VANILLA
    type = <societal_value_type>          # mercantilism_vs_free_trade, traditionalist_vs_innovative, etc.
    value = <script_value>                # societal_value_minor_move_to_right = 5, etc.
}
                                          # REPLACES: add_mercantilism (which doesn't exist in EU5)
                                          # Found in: laws.txt, vanilla events
                                          
CHARACTER CREATION ‚úÖ
----------------------------------
create_character = {                       # Create new character ‚úÖ CONFIRMED IN VANILLA
    first_name = name_john                # Localization key for first name
    adm = { 50 75 }                       # Admin stat range (min max)
    dip = { 60 80 }                       # Diplomatic stat range
    mil = { 70 95 }                       # Military stat range
    culture = culture:english             # Character culture
    religion = religion:catholic          # Character religion
    min_age = 30                          # Minimum age
    estate = estate_type:nobles_estate    # Assigned estate
    add_trait = trait:master_of_arms      # Add trait (can have multiple)
    create_in_limbo = yes                 # Create without attaching to court
    save_scope_as = my_character          # Save to scope for later reference
}
                                          # NO separate create_advisor or create_general effects!
                                          # High mil stats = suitable for general
                                          # High adm/dip stats + estate = suitable for advisor
                                          # Found in: flavor_vol.txt, hussite_wars.txt, etc.

======================
‚ùå EFFECTS THAT DON'T EXIST (Common mistakes from EU4)
======================

DO NOT USE - INVALID IN EU5:
----------------------------------
‚ùå add_mercantilism                       # USE: change_societal_value with mercantilism_vs_free_trade
‚ùå add_army_professionalism                # USE: add_army_tradition
‚ùå create_advisor                          # USE: create_character with high adm/dip and estate
‚ùå create_general                          # USE: create_character with high mil
‚ùå change_state_loyalty                    # NO STATE EFFECTS EXIST IN EU5
‚ùå change_state_tax_capacity               # NO STATE EFFECTS EXIST IN EU5
‚ùå add_base_tax                           # EU4 only
‚ùå add_base_production                    # EU4 only
‚ùå add_base_manpower                      # EU4 only

======================
KEY CONCEPTS
======================
Effects change the game state (create/kill characters, change ownership, modify values, etc.)
Effects require specific scopes (country, character, location, international_organization, etc.)
Some effects change the current scope

======================
SCOPE CHANGE EFFECTS
======================
save_scope_as = <name>                     # Save current scope for later reference
save_temporary_scope_as = <name>           # Save scope for same effect only
clear_saved_scope = <name>                 # Clear a saved scope
save_scope_value_as = { name = <name> value = <value> }  # Save numeric/bool value

======================
VARIABLE EFFECTS
======================
set_variable = { name = <name> value = <value> }           # Set a variable
set_global_variable = { name = <name> value = <value> }    # Set global variable
set_local_variable = { name = <name> value = <value> }     # Set local variable
change_variable = { name = <name> add/subtract/multiply/divide = <value> }
remove_variable = <name>                                    # Remove variable
clamp_variable = { name = <name> max = <value> min = <value> }
round_variable = { name = <name> nearest = <value> }

# List variables
add_to_list = <name>                                       # Add scope to list
add_to_variable_list = { name = <name> target = <scope> }
remove_from_list = <name>
clear_variable_list = <name>

======================
COUNTRY EFFECTS
======================
# Gold & Resources
add_gold = <value>                         # Add gold (flat amount)
add_yearly_gold = <value>                  # Add % of yearly gold income
add_manpower = <value>
add_sailors = <value>
set_gold = <value>
set_manpower = <value>
set_sailors = <value>

# Stability & Government
add_stability = <value>
set_stability = <value>
add_legitimacy = <value>
add_prestige = <value>
add_army_tradition = <value>
add_navy_tradition = <value>
add_war_exhaustion = <value>
add_inflation = <value>

# Country Relations
add_opinion = { modifier = <modifier> target = <country> scale = <value> }
remove_opinion = { modifier = <modifier> target = <country> }
add_trust = { modifier = <modifier> target = <country> scale = <value> }
add_antagonism = { modifier = <modifier> target = <country> scale = <value> }
add_casus_belli = { target = <country> type = <cb_type> }
remove_casus_belli = { target = <country> type = <cb_type> }
add_truce_with = { target = <country> months/years = <value> }

# Country Modifiers
add_country_modifier = { modifier = <modifier> days/months/years = <value> }
remove_country_modifier = <modifier_name>

# Culture & Religion
change_culture = <culture>
change_religion = <religion>
add_accepted_culture = <culture>
remove_accepted_culture = <culture>

# Subject Relations
make_subject_of = { target = <country> type = <subject_type> }
cancel_subject = <country>

# Government
change_government_type = <government>
add_reform = <government_reform>
remove_reform = <government_reform>

======================
INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATION EFFECTS
======================
create_international_organization = { type = <type> creator = <country> }
destroy_international_organization = { target = <io> reason = <key> }
add_country_to_international_organization = <country>
remove_country_from_international_organization = <country>
set_leader_country = <country>
add_policy_to_international_organization = <policy>
remove_policy_from_international_organization = <policy>
add_location_to_international_organization = <location>
international_organization_add_special_status = { country = <country> type = <type> }
international_organization_remove_special_status = { country = <country> type = <type> }

# IO Modifiers
add_international_organization_modifier = { modifier = <modifier> days/months/years = <value> }
remove_international_organization_modifier = <modifier_name>

======================
CHARACTER EFFECTS
======================
# Character Creation
create_character = { ... }                 # Create new character
kill_character = <character>
kill_character_silently = <character>

# Character Stats
add_adm = <value>
add_dip = <value>
add_mil = <value>

# Character Traits
add_trait = <trait>
remove_trait = <trait>
add_random_trait_from_category = <category>

# Character Roles
set_as_designated_heir = <character>
remove_ruler = <country>

# Character Relations
marry_character = <character>
divorce_character = <character>
adopt_character = <character>
change_father = <character>
change_mother = <character>

======================
LOCATION EFFECTS
======================
# Ownership
change_location_owner = <country>
change_location_controller = <country>
add_core = <country>
remove_core = <country>

# Development
change_development = <value>
change_prosperity = <value>

# Location Modifiers
add_location_modifier = { modifier = <modifier> days/months/years = <value> }
remove_location_modifier = <modifier_name>

# Buildings
construct_building = { building_type = <type> }
destroy_building = <building>

======================
EVENT/TRIGGER EFFECTS
======================
trigger_event = { id = <event_id> days/months/years = <value> }
custom_tooltip = <localization_key>
hidden_effect = { <effects> }              # Effects not shown in tooltip
show_as_tooltip = { <effects> }            # Show in tooltip but don't execute

======================
CONDITIONAL EFFECTS
======================
if = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }
else_if = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }
else = { <effects> }

# Conditional with always-shown tooltip
conditional_effect = {
    effect = { <effects> }
    limit = { <triggers> }
    else = { <effects> }
}

======================
RANDOM EFFECTS
======================
random = { chance = <0-100> <effects> }
random_list = {
    10 = { <effects> }
    20 = { modifier = { <mtth> } <effects> }
    70 = { <effects> }
}

======================
ITERATOR EFFECTS
======================
# Country iterators
every_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }
random_country = { limit = { <triggers> } weight = { <mtth> } <effects> }
ordered_country = { limit = { <triggers> } order_by = <value> <effects> }

every_subject = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }
every_neighbor_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }

# International Organization iterators
every_international_organization_member = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }
random_international_organization_member = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }

# Location iterators
every_owned_location = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }
every_core_location = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> }

======================
WARFARE EFFECTS
======================
declare_war = <country>
declare_war_with_cb = { target = <country> type = <cb_type> }
join_war_as_attacker = { war = <war> }
join_war_as_defender = { war = <war> }
leave_war = { war = <war> actor = <country> }
white_peace = <war>

======================
MODIFIER APPLICATION
======================
# Country scope
add_country_modifier = {
    modifier = <modifier_name>
    days/weeks/months/years = <duration>
    is_hidden = yes/no
}

# Location scope
add_location_modifier = {
    modifier = <modifier_name>
    days/weeks/months/years = <duration>
}

# Character scope
add_character_modifier = {
    modifier = <modifier_name>
    days/weeks/months/years = <duration>
}

# International Organization scope
add_international_organization_modifier = {
    modifier = <modifier_name>
    days/weeks/months/years = <duration>
}

======================
SCOPE TRANSITIONS
======================
# Execute effects in different scope
<country> = { <effects> }                  # Execute in specific country scope
capital = { <effects> }                    # Execute in capital location scope
owner = { <effects> }                      # Execute in owner scope
leader_country = { <effects> }             # Execute in IO leader scope
overlord = { <effects> }                   # Execute in overlord scope

======================
LOGGING & DEBUGGING
======================
debug_log = <message>
error_log = <message>
debug_log_scopes = yes/no

======================
COMMON PATTERNS
======================

# Add temporary modifier to country
add_country_modifier = {
    modifier = hanseatic_trade_bonus
    years = 10
}

# Change ownership and add core
change_location_owner = c:HSA
add_core = c:HSA

# Set variable and use it
set_variable = { name = my_value value = 50 }
if = {
    limit = { var:my_value > 25 }
    add_gold = var:my_value
}

# Save scope for later use
random_neighbor_country = {
    save_scope_as = target_country
    set_variable = { name = investigation_target value = scope:target_country }
}

# Add modifier to all members of IO
every_international_organization_member = {
    add_country_modifier = {
        modifier = io_membership_bonus
        years = 5
    }
}

# Create character and assign role
create_character = {
    age = 25
    culture = primary_culture
    religion = state_religion
    adm = 5
    dip = 4
    mil = 3
    save_scope_as = new_admiral
}
set_as_designated_heir = scope:new_admiral

======================
EFFECT CATEGORIES
======================

FLOW CONTROL:
- if/else_if/else
- random
- random_list
- while
- switch

SCOPE MANAGEMENT:
- save_scope_as
- save_temporary_scope_as
- clear_saved_scope
- every_*/random_*/ordered_*

COUNTRY STATE:
- add_gold, add_manpower, add_stability
- change_government_type, change_religion
- add_country_modifier

DIPLOMACY:
- add_opinion, add_trust, add_antagonism
- add_casus_belli, declare_war
- make_subject_of

CHARACTERS:
- create_character, kill_character
- add_trait, add_adm/dip/mil
- marry_character, set_as_designated_heir

LOCATIONS:
- change_location_owner, add_core
- change_development
- construct_building

INTERNATIONAL ORGANIZATIONS:
- create_international_organization
- add_country_to_international_organization
- set_leader_country
- add_policy_to_international_organization

======================
USAGE NOTES
======================
- Effects execute immediately (unlike triggers which check conditions)
- Use save_scope_as to reference scopes in later effects
- Variables persist across event chains unless temporary
- Modifiers can have duration (days/weeks/months/years) or be permanent (no duration)
- every_* iterators execute for ALL matching scopes
- random_* iterators execute for ONE random matching scope
- ordered_* iterators execute in specific order based on order_by value
- hidden_effect executes without showing tooltips
- show_as_tooltip shows effect in tooltip without executing

======================
COMPLETE EFFECTS LIST FROM WIKI (ALPHABETICAL)
======================
Source: https://eu5.paradoxwikis.com/Effect (fetched December 9, 2025)

This is the complete alphabetical list of all effects documented on the official EU5 wiki.
Each entry includes: Effect Name | Description | Usage | Scope | Target

abandon_colonial_charter | Abandons a colonial charter |   | none | colonial_charter
abandon_location | Abandons the target location! |   | country | location
activate_situation | activates a situation |   | none | situation
add_accepted_culture | Adds an accepted culture to a country |   | country | culture
add_additional_migration | adds a new migration source to a colonial charter. | add_additional_migration = <province> | colonial_charter |   
add_antagonism | Adds an antagonism modifier | add_antagonism = { modifier = <scripted_modifier> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
add_army_tradition | Adds army tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
add_artist_skill | gives (or takes) artist_skill to a character |   | character |   
add_avatar | adds an avatar to a country |   | country | avatar
add_bonus_warscore | adds some bonus war score to the supplied country. Usage: add_bonus_warscore = { country = country scope amount = script value = true, } |   | war |   
add_breach | adds a breach to the current siege |   | siege |   
add_casus_belli | Adds a casus belli for the current country scope against the target country. | add_casus_belli = { target = <country_scope> type = <casus_belli_type> [province = <province>] [days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> (-1 means permanently)] } | country |   
add_character_modifier | add a modifier to a character | [Expand] | character |   
add_colonial_claim | Add a colonial claim to the target province_definition. | add_colonial_claim = { province_definition = <province_definition> reason = <reason_loc> [category = <exclusive/same_religion>] } | country |   
add_cooldown | adds a cooldown for a country or international organization. | add_cooldown = { type = <token> days/weeks/months/years = <integer> } | country, international_organization |   
add_core | makes the location a core of the target country |   | location | country
add_country_modifier | add a modifier to a country | [Expand] | country |   
add_country_to_ international_organization | add a country to an international organization |   | international_organization | country
add_country_to_ international_organization_ no_update | add a country to an international organization without updating diplo statuses |   | international_organization | country
add_cultural_influence | gives (or takes) cultural_influence to a culture |   | culture |   
add_cultural_tradition | gives (or takes) cultural_tradition to a culture |   | culture |   
add_devotion | Adds devotion |   | country, international_organization |   
add_dip | Adds dip ability |   | character |   
add_diplomats | gives (or takes) diplomats for a country |   | country |   
add_doom | Adds doom |   | country, international_organization |   
add_enemy_to_ international_organization | add a country to an international organization |   | international_organization | country
add_estate_satisfaction | Changes the satisfaction of an estate |   | country |   
add_extended_winter | Adds extended winter to target area |   | none | area
add_favors | Adds favors | add_favors = { target = x value = y } | country |   
add_fertility | gives (or takes) fertility to a character |   | character |   
add_food | gives (or takes) Food to a unit |   | unit |   
add_food_percentage | gives (or takes) Food to a unit as a percentage of their max storage |   | unit |   
add_god | adds a god to a country |   | country | god
add_gold | Adds gold |   | country, international_organization |   
add_gold_ to_estate | Changes the gold of an estate |   | country |   
add_goods_supply | Adds goods to a market's stockpile. | add_goods_supply = { goods = <goods> amount = <amount> } | market |   
add_government_power | Adds government power |   | country, international_organization |   
add_harmony | Adds Harmony |   | country, international_organization |   
add_historical_rival | adds target country as an historical rival |   | country | country
add_honor | Adds honor |   | country, international_organization |   
add_horde_unity | Adds horde_unity |   | country, international_organization |   
add_inflation | Adds inflation |   | country, international_organization |   
add_internal_flag | adds effect to be read internally (no effect in the gamestate) |   | none |   
add_international_organization | add an international organization to a religion |   | religion | international_organization
add_international_ organization_modifier | add a modifier to an international organization | [Expand] | international_organization |   
add_karma | Adds karma |   | country, international_organization |   
add_legitimacy | Adds legitimacy |   | country, international_organization |   
add_liberty_desire | gives (or takes) liberty desire for a (subject) country |   | country |   
add_location_ as_core | Adds the target location as core |   | country | location
add_location_modifier | add a modifier to a location | [Expand] | location |   
add_location_to_ international_organization | add a location to an international organization |   | international_organization | location
add_manpower | Adds Manpower |   | country, international_organization |   
add_mercenary_modifier | add a modifier to a mercenary | [Expand] | mercenary |   
add_merchant_power | Adds temporary power to a merchant | add_merchant_power = { country = <country> power = value key = localisation months = y } | market |   
add_migration | sets up a migration | [Expand] | none |   
add_mil | Adds mil ability |   | character |   
add_morale | gives (or takes) morale to a unit |   | unit |   
add_navy_tradition | Adds navy tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
add_opinion | Adds an opinion modifier | add_opinion = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
add_policy | Add a policy to a country. |   | country | policy
add_policy_to_ international_organization | add a policy to an international organization |   | international_organization | policy
add_policy_wanted_ by_estate | For the country in scope, set the policy wanted by the input estate in the input law |   | country |   
add_pop | sets up a pop culture/religion/type/literacy/size possible to set. |   | location |   
add_pop_satisfaction | change the Satisfaction of a pop |   | pop |   
add_pop_size | change the size of a pop |   | pop |   
add_prestige | Adds prestige |   | country, international_organization |   
add_province_modifier | add a modifier to a unit | [Expand] | province |   
add_purity | Adds purity |   | country, international_organization |   
add_random_trait_ from_category | adds a random trait to a character from a category (admiral, artist, explorer, general, child, ruler) |   | character |   
add_rebel_modifier | add a modifier to a rebel | [Expand] | rebels |   
add_reform | adds a government reform. |   | country | government_reform
add_reform_desire | gives (or takes) reform desire for a religion |   | religion |   
add_religion_modifier | add a modifier from a unit | [Expand] | religion |   
add_religious_aspect | adds a religious_aspect to a country |   | country | religious_aspect
add_religious_focus | Add a completed religious focus to the country scope |   | country | religious_focus
add_religious_ focus_progress | Change the progress for the current religious focus to the country scope |   | country |   
add_religious_influence | Adds religious influence |   | country, international_organization |   
add_republican_tradition | Adds republican_tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
add_research_progress | gives (or takes) research progress for a country |   | country |   
add_righteousness | Adds Righteousness |   | country, international_organization |   
add_rite_power | Adds rite power |   | country, international_organization |   
add_rival | adds target country as a rival |   | country | country
add_road_to | adds a road from the scope location to the target location. | add_road_to = { target = <target_location> type = <road_type> } | location |   
add_sailors | Adds sailors |   | country, international_organization |   
add_self_control | Adds Self Control |   | country, international_organization |   
add_spy_network | Adds spy_network (target = x value = y} |   | country |   
add_stability | Adds stability |   | country, international_organization |   
add_subunit | Adds a subunit to a Unit |   | unit | unit_type
add_subunit_experience | gives (or takes) experience to a subunit |   | sub_unit |   
add_subunit_morale | gives (or takes) morale to a subunit |   | sub_unit |   
add_subunit_strength | gives (or takes) Strength to a subunit |   | sub_unit |   
add_subunit_ strength_percentage | gives (or takes) Strength in % of max to a subunit |   | sub_unit |   
add_temporary_demand | Adds a temporary demand to a market | add_temporary_demand = { type = demand scale = x months = months } | market |   
add_to_cabinet | Add the specified character to the cabinet |   | cabinet | character
add_to_ variable_list | Adds the event target to a variable list for the given duration | add_to_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> target = <event_target> days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> (optional) } | none |   
add_tolerated_culture | Adds an Tolerated culture to a country |   | country | culture
add_trait | adds a trait to a character |   | character | trait
add_tribal_cohesion | Adds tribal_cohesion |   | country, international_organization |   
add_truce_with | Adds a truce with the target country. | add_truce_with = { target = <target_country> [days/months/years = x] [mutual = yes] } | country |   
add_trust | Adds a trust modifier | add_trust = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
add_unit_modifier | add a modifier to a unit | [Expand] | unit |   
add_vfx | Adds VFX effects on the map |   | location |   
add_war_exhaustion | Adds WarExhaustion |   | country, international_organization |   
add_yanantin | Adds yanantin |   | country, international_organization |   
add_yearly_gold | Adds a proportion of your yearly gold |   | country |   
add_yearly_manpower | Adds a proportion of your yearly Manpower |   | country |   
add_yearly_sailors | Adds a proportion of your yearly sailors |   | country |   
adopt_character | makes a character adopt another |   | character | character
align_societal_ values_to | Aligns the societal values of the current country scope to the ones of the target country. |   | country | country
annex_country | annexes the target country. | annex_country = { country = <country> [reason = <Diplomatic|CivilWar|MilitaryConquest>] [transfer = yes] } | country |   
assert_if | Conditionally cause an assert during run time | assert_if = { limit = { <trigger> } text = <string> } | none |   
assert_read | Conditionally cause an assert during read time | assert_read = X, where X is yes or the string to be printed in the assert | none |   
become_hired_by | mercenaries are hired by the supplied country |   | mercenary | country
block_treaties | Block all possible treaties with the target country |   | country | country
change_building_level_ in_location | changes building level in location | change_building_level_in_location = { building = <type> value = <change> {owner = country} } | location |   
change_building_owner | assigns a new owner to a building |   | building | country
change_casus_belli_ creation_progress | Changes the progress when creating a casus belli against a target country. | change_casus_belli_creation_progress = { target = <country> value = <value> } | country |

change_character_religion | Changes religion for a character |   | character | religion

change_control | changes control |   | location |

change_country_color | changes the color of a country |   | country |   
change_country_ dynastic_name | Changes the name, adjective, and flag of a country to the dynasty of the ruler |   | country |   
change_country_flag | changes the flag of a country | change_country_flag = <coat_of_arms> | country | coat_of_arms
change_country_name | changes the name of a country |   | country |   
change_country_tag | changes the historical tag of a country |   | country |   
change_country_type | Changes the country type! |   | country |   
change_cultural_view | Changes the cultural view of target. | change_cultural_view = { target = x change = relation_change } | culture |   
change_culture | Changes culture for a country |   | country | culture
change_development | changes development |   | location |   
change_disease_presence | Adds a value to the presence of a disease in a location or subunit. Disease must already be present there. | change_disease_presence = { disease = <source_disease> value = <script_value> } | location, sub_unit |   
change_dynasty | changes dynasty to target dynasty |   | character | dynasty
change_exploration_progress | change the progress of an exploration |   | exploration |   
change_explorer | sets a new explorer for an exploration in the current country | change_explorer { area = x character = y } | country |   
change_father | changes father to target character |   | character | character
change_garrison_size | Changes the garrison size of the target location by the specified value. |   | location |   
change_global_variable | Changes the value or a numeric variable | change_variable = { name = <variable_name> <operation> = <value> } Valid operations are add, subtract, multiply, divide, modulo, min and max  | none |   
change_government_type | Changes government-type for a country |   | country | government
change_heir_selection | Changes heir_selection for a country |   | country | heir_selection
change_institution_progress | changes Institution progress in location | change_institution_progress = { institution = <type> value = <change> } | location |

change_location_owner | change owner of Location to target country |   | location | country
change_location_rank | changes the location_rank of the location (ie, makes it a city, town, rural_settlement etc |   | location | location_rank

clamp_local_variable | Clamps a variable the specified max and min | clamp_variable = { name = <variable_name> max = <script_value> min = <script_value> } | none |   
clamp_variable | Clamps a variable the specified max and min | clamp_variable = { name = <variable_name> max = <script_value> min = <script_value> } | none |

clear_local_ variable_list | Empties the list | clear_variable_list = variable_name | none |   
clear_saved_scope | Clears a saved scope | clear_saved_scope = <scope_name> | none |   
clear_variable_list | Empties the list | clear_variable_list = variable_name | none |   
conditional_effect | An effect which works similar to a simple if effect, but it will always display the effect and conditions for the effect to happen. Also has an else section in case the conditions are not met. | conditional_effect = { effect = <effects> limit = <triggers> [else = <effects>] } | none |   
construct_building | starts the construction of the specified building in the location. | [Expand] | location |   
construct_estate_building | starts the construction of the specified building by an estate in the location | construct_estate_building = { building_type = x estate_type = x } | location |   
construct_location_rank | starts a construction to change the location_rank of the location (ie, makes it a city, town, rural_settlement etc |   | location | location_rank
construct_rgo_upgrade | starts the construction of an RGO upgrade in the location. |   | location |   
construct_road | starts the construction of a road from A to B owned by the scope country. | construct_road = { road_type = scoped road type from = location to = location } | country |

Make sure to use add_country_to_international_organization / set_leader_country to set up the leader if needed. | create_international_organization = { type = <type_id> [creator = <country> (country which would found the IO)] [target = <country>] } | none | international_organization

every_pop | Iterate through all pops in a location or country | every_pop = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country, location | pop
every_pops_ supporting_rebel | Iterate through all pops supporting a rebel | every_pops_supporting_rebel = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | rebels | pop
every_port_ in_country | Iterate through all Ports in a country | every_port_in_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | location
every_possible_disaster | Iterate through all possible disasters for a country | every_possible_disaster = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | disaster
every_possible_ parliament_issue | Iterate through all possible parliament issues in a country's or an international organization's parliament | every_possible_parliament_issue = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country, international_organization | parliament_issue
every_possible_policy | Iterate through all possible policies of a Country that is not currently implemeted | every_possible_policy = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | policy
every_possible_privilege | Iterate through all possible & allowed estate privileges of a Country that is not currently implemeted | every_possible_privilege = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | estate | estate_privilege
every_present_country | Iterate through all countries in the specified geography | every_present_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | area, continent, location, province_definition, region, sub_continent | country
every_present_overlord | Iterate through all countries which have a subject in the specified geography | every_present_overlord = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | area, continent, location, province_definition, region, sub_continent | country
every_present_religion_ in_country | Iterate through all religions present in the country. | every_present_religion_in_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | religion
every_present_religion_ in_location | Iterate through all religions present in the location. | every_present_religion_in_location = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | location | religion
every_primary_or_ accepted_culture | Iterate through primary culture and all accepted cultures in a country. Primary is ordered first. | every_primary_or_accepted_culture = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | culture
every_primary_or_ accepted_or_ tolerated_culture | Iterate through primary culture and all accepted and all tolerated cultures in a country. Primary is ordered first. | every_primary_or_accepted_or_tolerated_culture = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | culture
every_privateer | Iterate through all privateers in the world | every_privateer = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | none | privateer
every_privateer_ from_country | Iterate through all privateers a country has | every_privateer_from_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | privateer
every_privateer_ in_area | Iterate through all privateers in a area | every_privateer_in_area = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | area | privateer
every_production_method | Iterate through all types of production methods. | every_production_method = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | none | production_method

every_related_country | Iterate through all related countries | every_related_country = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | country
every_religion | Iterate through all religions | every_religion = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | none | religion
every_religion_ for_god | Iterate through all Religions of a God | every_religion_for_god = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | god | religion
every_religion_in_ religion_group | Iterate through all religions in a religion group. | every_religion_in_religion_group = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | group | religion

every_religious_aspect | Iterate through all religious aspects of a Country | every_religious_aspect = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | religious_aspect
every_religious_focus | Iterate through all completed religious focuses of a Country | every_religious_focus = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | religious_focus
every_rented_ out_mercenary | Iterate through mercenaries a country has rented out to the market | every_rented_out_mercenary = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | country | mercenary
every_required_goods | Iterate through all goods required by the scope production method. | every_required_goods = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | production_method | goods
every_right_flank | Iterate through all subunits on the right-flank of a combat-side | every_right_flank = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | combat_side | sub_unit

execute_prisoners | Prisoners get executed |   | unit |   
execute_propose_effect | Execute the popose_effect of any implementable object (policies, avatar, cabinet_action, estate_privilege, god, government_reform). | execute_propose_effect = { source = <implementable object id> [<flag> = <scope>] } | none |   
extend_regency | extends the regency by X years |   | country |   
finalize_resolution | End the target resolution for the current situation or international organization. |   | international_organization, situation | resolution
find_route | Finds route between start location and closest eligible end location | [Expand] | none |   
fire_generic_action | fires a generic action with the country as the actor and the supplied thing as the recipient |   | none |   
floodfill_locations | Generates a list of floodfilled locations from adjacencies. Needs a limit specified to avoid floodfilling everything. |   | location |   
force_city_ gfx_rebuild | Rebuilds the city gfx |   | none | location
force_recalc_country_ active_status | Recalculates active country status |   | none | country
force_refresh_culture_ and_religion | Recalculates dominant relgion and culture in a location |   | none | location
force_union | Current country scope forces a union with the target scope. In case of a union merge, the country which forces the union keeps the ruler. |   | country | country
form_country | Forms a new country (using formable system) |   | country | formable_country
form_new_culture | Creates a new culture in this country from the primary culture |   | country |   
found_dynasty | Makes the character found a new dynasty. If no name is specified, it will be named after the character's birth Location, but the effect still needs to be inside curly brackets |   | character |   
garrison_sortie | The defender of the siege in scope executes a garrison sortie. This creates a unit with fort garrison and attacks the sieging armies. If the siege defender loses this combat, the fort will be instantly occupied by the siege attacker. | <siege_scope> = { garrison_sortie = yes } | siege |   
give_loan | gives a loan | give_loan = { target = country amount = gold interest = percent months = months } | country | loan
grant_estate_privilege | grants a special estate priviledge. |   | country | estate_privilege
grant_parliament_agenda | Accept the specified target parliament agenda. |   | country, international_organization | parliament_agenda
if | Executes enclosed effects if limit criteria are met | if = { limit = { <triggers> } <effects> } | none |   
impregnate | Impregnates a target character |   | character | character
international_organization_add_ special_status | international organization bestows special status on a country |   | international_organization |   
international_organization_chooses_ new_leader | international organization chooses a new leader |   | none | international_organization
international_organization_remove_ special_status | international organization removes special status from a country |   | international_organization |   
join_war_against | joins the target war as an enemy of the target country. | join_war_against = { war = war scope target = country scope call_in_subjects = yes/no } | country |   
make_saint_in_ character_religion | Makes a character a saint in their religion, regardless of the country's religion |   | character | country
make_subject_of | Becomes a subject of the target country | make_subject_of = { target = x type = y } | country |   
make_unit_available_ for_hire | make the usit available for hire as a mercenary. | make_unit_available_for_hire = { cost_multiplier = <> months = <> } | unit | mercenary
marry_character | Marries character to target character |   | character | character
merge_culture_group | Merges the primary culture's culture group in this country |   | country | culture_group
move_art | Moves art to a target location |   | work_of_art | location
move_country | Moves character to target country |   | character | country
move_prisoners_ to_safety | Prisoners are moved to a safe location |   | unit |   
move_to_assist_ on_adjacent_combat | Sets unit flag to join adjacent combat automatically. yes/no |   | unit |

random_voter | Iterate through all voters in an active resolution | random_voter = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | active_resolution | country

random_work_of_ art_in_country | Iterate through all work_of_art in a country | random_work_of_art_in_country = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | country | work_of_art
random_work_of_ art_in_location | Iterate through all work_of_art in a location | random_work_of_art_in_location = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | location | work_of_art
ransom_prisoners | Prisoners are released back to their countries for a price |   | unit |   
refund_price | Refund a Price to a country |   | country | price
release_non_cores | releases all non-core provinces |   | country |   
relocate_market | moves the market to the target location |   | market | location
remove_accepted_culture | Removes an accepted culture from a country |   | country | culture
remove_additional_migration | removes an additional migration source to a colonial charter. | remove_additional_migration = <province> | colonial_charter |   
remove_all_ casus_belli | removes all casus belli on the target country |   | country | country
remove_antagonism | Removes an antagonism modifier | remove_antagonism = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
remove_avatar | removed an avatar from a country |   | country | avatar
remove_breach | removes a breach from the current siege |   | siege |   
remove_casus_belli | Removes casus_belli | remove_casus_belli = { target = x type = y <province = prov> } | country |   
remove_character_allegiance | Remove the character scope from the rebel group they are part of. |   | character |   
remove_character_modifier | Remove a modifier from a character | remove_character_modifier = name | character |   
remove_colonial_claim | Removed the colonial claim in the target province_definition |   | none | province_definition
remove_commander | removes the target character from his unit |   | none | character
remove_cooldown | Removes a cooldown for a country or international organization. | remove_cooldown = <cooldown_token> | country, international_organization |   
remove_from_list | Removes the current scope from a named list remove_from_list = <string> |   | none |   
remove_global_variable | Removes a variable | remove_variable = variable_name | none |   
remove_god | removed a god from a country |   | country | god
remove_historical_rival | removes target country as an historical rival |   | country | country
remove_international_ organization_modifier | Remove a modifier from an international organization | remove_international_organization_modifier = name | international_organization |   
remove_law | Makes a law get no options, which may make it disappear |   | country | law
remove_law_from_ international_organization | remove a law from an international organization |   | international_organization | law
remove_policy_from_ international_organization | remove a policy from an international organization |   | international_organization | policy
remove_pop_allegiance | removed allegienace of a pop |   | pop |   
remove_province_modifier | Remove a modifier from a province | remove_province_modifier = name | province |   
remove_rebel_modifier | Remove a modifier from a rebel | remove_rebel_modifier = name | rebels |   
remove_reform | removes the government reform desired. |   | country | government_reform
remove_relation | Removes a relation with the target country |   | none |   
remove_religion_modifier | Remove a modifier from a religion | remove_religion_modifier = name | religion |   
remove_religious_aspect | removed a religious_aspect from a country |   | country | religious_aspect
remove_religious_focus | Remove a completed religious focus from the country scope |   | country | religious_focus
remove_rival | removes target country as a rival |   | country | country
remove_ruler | Removes the character as ruler from the target country |   | character | country
remove_temporary_demand | Remove a temporary demand in a market |   | market | demand
remove_tolerated_culture | Removes an Tolerated culture from a country |   | country | culture
remove_trait | removes a trait to a character |   | character | trait
remove_traits_ of_category | Removes all traits of a specified category. Supports the categories: ruler, general, admiral, artist, explorer, child, religious_figure |   | character |   
remove_truce_with | Removes the truce with the target country |   | country | country
remove_trust | Removes a trust modifier | remove_trust = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
remove_unit_modifier | Remove a modifier from a unit | remove_unit_modifier = name | unit |   
remove_vfx | Removes VFX effects on the map |   | location |   
remove_war_exhaustion | Removes WarExhaustion |   | country, international_organization |   
remove_yanantin | Removes yanantin |   | country, international_organization |   
remove_yearly_gold | Removes a proportion of your yearly gold |   | country |   
remove_yearly_manpower | Removes a proportion of your yearly Manpower |   | country |   
remove_yearly_sailors | Removes a proportion of your yearly sailors |   | country |   
rename_location | changes the name of a location |   | location |   
request_ransom_prisoners | An offer to ransom the unit's troops is sent to all original owners |   | unit |   
research_advance | Research a specific advance | research_advance = name | country | advance_type
reset_regency | performs the start_effect of a regency again |   | country |   
reverse_add_antagonism | Adds a reverse antagonism modifier | reverse_add_antagonism = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
reverse_add_opinion | Adds an reverse opinion modifier | reverse_add_opinion = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
reverse_add_trust | Adds a reverse trust modifier | reverse_add_trust = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
reverse_change_ cultural_view | Sets the targets cultural view of current culture. | reverse_change_cultural_view = { target = x value = relation_change } | culture |   
reverse_change_ religion_view | Sets the targets religion view of current religion. | reverse_change_religion_view = { target = x value = relation_change } | religion |   
reverse_set_ cultural_view | Sets the targets cultural view of current culture. | reverse_set_cultural_view = { target = x value = relation_level } | culture |   
reverse_set_ religious_view | Sets the targets Religious view of current Religion. | reverse_set_religious_view = { target = x value = relation_level } | religion |   
reverse_set_ school_opinion | Sets the targets school_opinion of current Religious School. | reverse_set_school_opinion = { target = x value = relation_level } | religious_school |   
set_army_tradition | Sets army tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
set_art_owner | Sets a new owner for the work of art |   | work_of_art | country
set_as_commander | sets the commander of a unit to the specified character |   | unit | character
set_as_ designated_heir | Sets the target character as the designated heir for the scope country. | set_as_designated_heir = <character> or set_as_designated_heir = { target = <character> [reason = <reason>] } | country | character
set_doom | Sets doom |   | country, international_organization |   
set_dynasty_ name_type | changes dynasty to have a specific dynasty_name_type (default, location, patronym, descendant) |   | dynasty |   
set_ethnicity | Set the ethnicity of a character |   | character | ethnicity
set_first_name | Set the first name of a character to the defined string or scoped character |   | character |   
set_garrison_size | Sets the garrison size of the target location to the specified value. |   | location |   
set_global_variable | Sets a variable | [Expand] | none |   
set_gold | Sets gold |   | country, international_organization |   
set_government_power | Sets government power |   | country, international_organization |   
set_harmony | Sets Harmony |   | country, international_organization |   
set_honor | Sets honor |   | country, international_organization |   
set_horde_unity | Sets horde_unity |   | country, international_organization |   
set_inflation | Sets inflation |   | country, international_organization |   
set_karma | Sets karma |   | country, international_organization |   
set_leader_country | set the leader country of an international organization |   | international_organization | country
set_legitimacy | Sets legitimacy |   | country, international_organization |   
set_participated_ in_parliament | Mark the country as having participated in the parliament of the target international organization. Is automatically set when a country votes in a parliament which has the resolution. |   | country | international_organization
set_prestige | Sets prestige |   | country, international_organization |   
set_purity | Sets purity |   | country, international_organization |   
set_regent | Makes the target_character the acting regent |   | country | character
set_religious_influence | Sets religious influence |   | country, international_organization |   
set_religious_school | Sets the religious_school to the target school |   | country | religious_school
set_religious_view | Sets the Religious view of target. | set_religious_view = { target = x value = relation_level } | religion |   
set_republican_tradition | Sets republican_tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
set_revolution | Make the country either revolutionary if set to yes, or get remove its revoutionary status if set to no. |   | country |   
set_revolution_target | Make the country to the target of the revolution if set to yes, or remove it when set to no. |   | country |   
set_righteousness | Sets Righteousness |   | country, international_organization |   
set_rite_power | Sets rite power |   | country, international_organization |   
set_sailors | Sets sailors |   | country, international_organization |   
set_school_opinion | Sets the school_opinion of target. | set_school_opinion = { target = x value = relation_level } | religious_school |   
set_self_control | Sets Self Control |   | country, international_organization |   
set_societal_value | Sets societal value |   | country |   
set_stability | Sets stability |   | country, international_organization |   
set_subsidized | change whether a building is subsidised or not |   | building |   
set_to_limited_ random_stat | Sets the stats of the character scope to a random value between a min and max value. | set_to_limited_random_stat = { ability = adm/dip/mil max = <scripted value> min = <scripted value> } | character |   
set_tribal_cohesion | Sets tribal_cohesion |   | country, international_organization |   
set_tutorial_var | Sets tutorial var. |   | none |   
set_unit_size | Sets the number of people in each subunit in the Unit to the given percentage of maximum |   | unit |   
set_variable | Sets a variable | [Expand] | none |   
set_vote | Sets the vote for a country on a resolution in an international organization or situation. | set_vote = { voter = <country> resolution = <resolution> vote = <whatever> [locked = yes/no] } | international_organization, situation |   
set_war_exhaustion | Sets WarExhaustion |   | country, international_organization |   
set_yanantin | Sets yanantin |   | country, international_organization |   
show_as_tooltip | Enclosed effects are only shown in tooltips (but are not actually executed) | show_as_tooltip = { <more_effects> } | none |   
sort_global_ variable_list | Sorts a variable list | sort_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> order = <script_value> } | none |   
sort_local_ variable_list | Sorts a variable list | sort_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> order = <script_value> } | none |   
sort_variable_list | Sorts a variable list | sort_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> order = <script_value> } | none |   
spawn_army_ levy_unit | Spawn an army levy unit for the target country in the current location scope |   | none | country
spawn_disease | Spawns a disease in a location or on a subunit. | spawn_disease = { disease = <disease> value = <script_value> } | location | disease_outbreak
spawn_navy_ levy_unit | Spawn a navy levy unit for the target country in the current location scope |   | none | country
split_pop | Splits a pop and makes changes to it. If both size and fraction are scripted, it will use the largest. | [Expand] | pop |   
stall_exploration | enable/disable stall on exploration |   | exploration |   
start_civil_war | Make the rebels rise up against the country, starting a civil war. Has no effect if the country is already in a civil war. Will scope immediately into the rebel country tag. |   | rebels | country
start_conquistador | Creates a new conquistador in the current country | [Expand] | country |   
start_exploration | Creates a new exploration in the current country | start_exploration = { area = <area> character = <character> price = <price> price_modifier = <number> } | country |   
start_mission | The country starts immediately the specified mission. Will not do anything if a mission is active already. | start_mission = { mission = <mission_scope> [optional any parameters to pass in, eg target = x] } | country |   
start_periphora_towards | Starts a periphora towards the target location. Art will move towards the destination slowly in a procession. |   | work_of_art | location
start_revolt | Make the rebels rise up against the country in the form of a revolt. |   | rebels |   
start_trade | Starts a trade | start_trade = { type = <trade_type> target = <country> } | country |   
start_union | Starts a union | start_union = { target = <country> } | country |   
start_vote | Starts a vote on a resolution in an international organization or situation. | start_vote = { resolution = <resolution> } | international_organization, situation |   
start_war | Starts a war | start_war = { target = <country> type = <war_type> } | country |   
start_work_of_art | Starts the creation of a work of art | start_work_of_art = { type = <work_of_art_type> } | country |   
switch | Executes effects based on a switch value | switch = { trigger = <trigger> <case> = { <effects> } } | none |   
take_loan | Takes a loan | take_loan = { amount = gold interest = percent months = months } | country | loan
transfer_occupation | Transfers the occupation of the current location to the target country |   | location | country
transfer_trade_power | Transfers trade power | transfer_trade_power = { target = <country> amount = <script_value> } | country |   
trigger_event | Triggers an event | trigger_event = { id = <event_id> days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> } | none |   
unite | Unites the current country with the target country | unite = { target = <country> } | country |   
update_market | Updates the market |   | market |   
update_price | Updates the price of a good | update_price = { good = <good> price = <script_value> } | market |   
validate_government | Validates the government |   | country |   
validate_laws | Validates the laws |   | country |   
validate_policies | Validates the policies |   | country |   
validate_religious_aspects | Validates the religious aspects |   | country |   
validate_religious_focuses | Validates the religious focuses |   | country |   
validate_societal_values | Validates the societal values |   | country |   

======================
FULL EFFECTS LIST FROM WIKI (ALPHABETICAL) - UPDATED 2024
======================
# This section contains the complete alphabetical list of all effects from the official wiki
# Format: name | description | syntax | scope | target

abandon_colonial_charter | Abandons a colonial charter |   | none | colonial_charter
abandon_location | Abandons the target location! |   | country | location
activate_situation | activates a situation |   | none | situation
add_accepted_culture | Adds an accepted culture to a country |   | country | culture
add_additional_migration | adds a new migration source to a colonial charter. | add_additional_migration = <province> | colonial_charter |   
add_adm | Adds adm ability |   | character |   
add_casus_belli | Adds a casus belli for the current country scope against the target country. | add_casus_belli = { target = <country_scope> type = <casus_belli_type> [province = <province>] [days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> (-1 means permanently)] } | country |   
add_character_modifier | add a modifier to a character | [Expand] | character |   
add_colonial_claim | Add a colonial claim to the target province_definition. | add_colonial_claim = { province_definition = <province_definition> reason = <reason_loc> [category = <exclusive/same_religion>] } | country |   
add_cultural_influence | Add cultural influence to culture scope | add_cultural_influence = <value> | culture |   
add_cultural_tradition | gives (or takes) cultural_tradition to a culture |   | culture |   
add_devotion | Adds devotion |   | country, international_organization |   
add_dip | Adds dip ability |   | character |   
add_diplomats | gives (or takes) diplomats for a country |   | country |   
add_doom | Adds doom |   | country, international_organization |   
add_enemy_to_international_organization | add a country to an international organization |   | international_organization | country
add_estate_satisfaction | Changes the satisfaction of an estate |   | country |   
add_extended_winter | Adds extended winter to target area |   | none | area
add_location_modifier | add a modifier to a location | [Expand] | location |   
add_location_to_international_organization | add a location to an international organization |   | international_organization | location
add_manpower | Adds Manpower |   | country, international_organization |   
add_mercenary_modifier | add a modifier to a mercenary | [Expand] | mercenary |   
add_merchant_power | Adds temporary power to a merchant | add_merchant_power = { country = <country> power = value key = localisation months = y } | market |   
add_migration | sets up a migration | [Expand] | none |   
add_mil | Adds mil ability |   | character |   
add_pop | sets up a pop culture/religion/type/literacy/size possible to set. |   | location |   
add_pop_satisfaction | change the Satisfaction of a pop |   | pop |   
add_pop_size | change the size of a pop |   | pop |   
add_prestige | Adds prestige |   | country, international_organization |   
add_province_modifier | add a modifier to a unit | [Expand] | province |   
add_purity | Adds purity |   | country, international_organization |   
add_random_trait_from_category | adds a random trait to a character from a category (admiral, artist, explorer, general, child, ruler) |   | character |   
add_rebel_modifier | add a modifier to a rebel | [Expand] | rebels |   
add_rebel_progress | change the progress of a rebel faction |   | rebels |   
add_reform | adds a government reform. |   | country | government_reform
add_reform_desire | gives (or takes) reform desire for a religion |   | religion |   
add_religion_modifier | add a modifier to a unit | [Expand] | religion |   
add_religious_aspect | adds a religious_aspect to a country |   | country | religious_aspect
add_religious_focus | Add a completed religious focus to the country scope |   | country | religious_focus
add_religious_focus_progress | Change the progress for the current religious focus to the country scope |   | country |   
add_religious_influence | Adds religious influence |   | country, international_organization |   
add_republican_tradition | Adds republican_tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
add_research_progress | gives (or takes) research progress for a country |   | country |   
add_righteousness | Adds Righteousness |   | country, international_organization |   
add_rite_power | Adds rite power |   | country, international_organization |   
add_rival | adds target country as a rival |   | country | country
add_to_global_variable_list | Adds the event target to a variable list for the given duration | add_to_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> target = <event_target> days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> (optional) } | none |   
add_to_list | Adds the current scope to an arbitrarily-named list (or creates the list if not already present) to be referenced later in the (unbroken) event chain | add_to_list = <name_of_list> add_to_list = { name = <name_of_list> value = <script_value> } NOTE, if adding a permanent target to a temporary list, the whole list becomes permanent | none |   
add_to_local_variable_list | Adds the event target to a variable list for the given duration | add_to_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> target = <event_target> days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> (optional) } | none |   
add_to_temporary_list | Adds the current scope to an arbitrarily-named list (or creates the list if not already present) to be referenced later in the same effect | add_to_temporary_list = <name_of_list> add_to_temporary_list = { name = <name_of_list> value = <script_value> } NOTE, if adding a temporary target to a permanent list, the list will stay permanent | none |   
add_to_variable_list | Adds the event target to a variable list for the given duration | add_to_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> target = <event_target> days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> (optional) } | none |   
add_tolerated_culture | Adds an Tolerated culture to a country |   | country | culture
add_trait | adds a trait to a character |   | character | trait
add_tribal_cohesion | Adds tribal_cohesion |   | country, international_organization |   
add_truce_with | Adds a truce with the target country. | add_truce_with = { target = <target_country> [days/months/years = x] [mutual = yes] } | country |   
add_trust | Adds a trust modifier | add_trust = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
add_unit_modifier | add a modifier to a unit | [Expand] | unit |   
add_vfx | Adds VFX effects on the map |   | location |   
add_war_exhaustion | Adds WarExhaustion |   | country, international_organization |   
add_yanantin | Adds yanantin |   | country, international_organization |   
assert_if | Conditionally cause an assert during run time | assert_if = { limit = { <trigger> } text = <string> } | none |   
assert_read | Conditionally cause an assert during read time | assert_read = X, where X is yes or the string to be printed in the assert | none |   
become_hired_by | mercenaries are hired by the supplied country |   | mercenary | country
block_treaties | Block all possible treaties with the target country |   | country | country
change_garrison_size | Changes the garrison size of the target location by the specified value. |   | location |   
change_global_variable | Changes the value or a numeric variable | change_variable = { name = <variable_name> <operation> = <value> } Valid operations are add, subtract, multiply, divide, modulo, min and max  | none |   
change_government_type | Changes government-type for a country |   | country | government
change_heir_selection | Changes heir_selection for a country |   | country | heir_selection
change_institution_progress | changes Institution progress in location | change_institution_progress = { institution = <type> value = <change> } | location |   
change_local_variable | Changes the value or a numeric variable | change_variable = { name = <variable_name> <operation> = <value> } Valid operations are add, subtract, multiply, divide, modulo, min and max  | none |   
change_location_controller | change controller of Location to target country |   | location | country
change_location_owner | change owner of Location to target country |   | location | country
change_location_rank | changes the location_rank of the location (ie, makes it a city, town, rural_settlement etc |   | location | location_rank
change_maritime_presence_power | Add or remove maritime presence power for the specified country in the current location scope. | change_maritime_presence_power = { country = <country_scope> value = <script_value> } | location |   
change_max_raw_material_workers | increases rgo size |   | location |   
change_mother | changes mother to target character |   | character | character
change_parliament_issue_support | gives (or takes) support for the issue in parliament |   | country, international_organization |   
change_player | Changes the player in the current country scope to play another country |   | country | country
change_pop_allegiance | change rebel allegiance of pop to target Rebel |   | pop | rebels
change_pop_culture | Changes culture for a pop |   | pop | culture
change_pop_owner | change owner of pop to target country |   | pop | country
change_pop_religion | Changes religion for a pop |   | pop | religion
change_pop_type | changes pop type of the pop |   | pop | pop_type
change_privateer_owner | changes the owner of a privateer to the target country |   | privateer | country
change_privateer_power | change the power of a privateer |   | privateer |   
change_prosperity | changes prosperity |   | location |   
change_province_food | changes the province food stockpile |   | province |   
change_province_food_percentage | changes the province food stockpile by a percentage of the max |   | province |   
change_province_integration | Changes integration_level of a province |   | province |   
change_province_owner | change owner of Province to target country |   | province | country
change_raw_material | changes the raw-material produced in a location |   | location | goods
change_religion | Changes religion for a country |   | country | religion
change_religion_view | Changes the religion view of target.. { target = x change = relation_change = true, } |   | religion |   
change_societal_value | Changes societal value |   | country |   
change_variable | Changes the value or a numeric variable | change_variable = { name = <variable_name> <operation> = <value> } Valid operations are add, subtract, multiply, divide, modulo, min and max  | none |   
clamp_global_variable | Clamps a variable the specified max and min | clamp_variable = { name = <variable_name> max = <script_value> min = <script_value> } | none |   
clamp_local_variable | Clamps a variable the specified max and min | clamp_variable = { name = <variable_name> max = <script_value> min = <script_value> } | none |   
clamp_variable | Clamps a variable the specified max and min | clamp_variable = { name = <variable_name> max = <script_value> min = <script_value> } | none |   
clear_global_variable_list | Empties the list | clear_variable_list = variable_name | none |   
clear_local_variable_list | Empties the list | clear_variable_list = variable_name | none |   
clear_saved_scope | Clears a saved scope from the top scope | save_scope_as = cool_scope -> clear_saved_scope = cool_scope | none |   
clear_variable_list | Empties the list | clear_variable_list = variable_name | none |   
close_all_views | Closes all views. close_all_views = yes |   | none |   
complete_mission_task | The country scope completes the specified mission task. Does not do anything if the mission task is not part of the currently active mission and if it is not visible. |   | country | mission_task
conditional_effect | An effect which works similar to a simple if effect, but it will always display the effect and conditions for the effect to happen. Also has an else section in case the conditions are not met. | conditional_effect = { effect = <effects> limit = <triggers> [else = <effects>] } | none |   
construct_building | starts the construction of the specified building in the location. | [Expand] | location |   
construct_estate_building | starts the construction of the specified building by an estate in the location | construct_estate_building = { building_type = x estate_type = x } | location |   
create_character | Creates a character for a country |   | country | character
create_colonial_charter | Creates a colonial charter in the target province_definition |   | country |   
create_country_from_cores_in_our_locations | creates the country from its cores |   | country | country
create_country_from_location | Creates a new country with the current location scope as capital and then scopes to the new country |   | location | country
create_dynasty_from_location | Creates a new dynasty with the desired name |   | location |   
create_estate_loan | scope country takes a specialized estate loan | create_estate_loan = { amount = gold interest = percent months = months } | country | loan
create_holy_site | Creates a holy site |   | none | holy_site
create_international_organization | Creates an empty international organization, changing the scope to the created IO. Make sure to use add_country_to_international_organization / set_leader_country to set up the leader if needed. | create_international_organization = { type = <type_id> [creator = <country> (country which would found the IO)] [target = <country>] } | none | international_organization
create_location_country_from_province | Creates a new country with the current Province scope as capital and then scopes to the new country |   | province | country
create_market | creates a market. | [Expand] | none |   
create_rebel | Creates a new rebel with in the current country | [Expand] | country | rebels
create_relation | Creates a relation with the target country. | create_relation = { type = <scripted relation type key> first = <country> second = <country> [years/months/days = <script_integer> for expiring relations ] } | none |   
create_route | Finds route between a select start and end location. | [Expand] | none |   
create_sub_unit | creates the specified subunit |   | location | unit_type
create_sub_unit_of_category | creates the best subunit of the specified category |   | location | sub_unit_category
create_sub_unit_with_owner | spawns a subunit in location | create_sub_unit_with_owner = { type = <type> owner = country origin = location (for generating culture) } | location |   
create_trade | creates a trade. | [Expand] | country |   
create_union | Current country scope creates a union with the target scope. Unions get merged if either country has a union already. |   | country | country
custom_description | Wraps effects that get a custom description instead of the auto-generated one | [Expand] | none |   
custom_description_no_bullet | Wraps effects that get a custom description instead of the auto-generated one. Also ensures no bullet point appears | [Expand] | none |   
debug_log_date | Logs the current date to the debug.log |   | none |   
debug_log_scopes | Log the current scope to the debug log when this effect executes | debug_log_scopes = yes # log full scope info debug_log_scopes = no # log only current scope | none |   
declare_war | declares a war with the target country |   | country | country
declare_war_with_cb | declares a war with a specific cb | declare_war_with_cb = { target = <country> type = <cb_type> } | country |   
destroy_all_buildings_of_type | destroys the specified building in the location |   | location | building_type
destroy_art | destroys the target art |   | none | work_of_art
destroy_building | destroys the specified building in the location |   | location | building
destroy_colonial_charter | destroys the target colonial_charter |   | none | colonial_charter
destroy_holy_site | destroys the target holy site |   | none | holy_site
destroy_international_organization | destroys the target international organization. | destroy_international_organization = { target = <io_scope> reason = <loc key for reason> } | country |   
destroy_international_organization_no_instigator | destroys the target international organization. | destroy_international_organization_no_instigator = { target = <io_scope> reason = <loc key for reason> } | none |   
destroy_market | destroys the market |   | market |   
destroy_mercenary | Mercenary gets routed and scatters |   | none | mercenary
destroy_pop | destroys a pop |   | none | pop
destroy_rebel | Destroys the target rebel |   | none | rebels
destroy_subunit | Destroys the unit from the current scope |   | sub_unit |   
destroy_unit | Destroys the unit from the current scope |   | unit |   
discover_area | country discovers the target_area |   | country | area
discover_location | target country discoves this location |   | location | country
dismiss_mercenary | dismisses a mercenary for the target country |   | country | mercenary
dismiss_privateer | dismisses a privateer for the target country |   | area | country
divorce_character | Marries character to target character |   | character | character
drop_antagonism_bomb | Drops an antagonism bomb at a location, causing antagonism with surrounding countries depending on how they feel about you and the target. | drop_antagonism_bomb = { target = <location> value = <script_value for base antagonism> modifier = <antagonism_bias> [is_taking_value = yes <calculates antagonism as if the target would be taken>] } | country |   
else | Executes enclosed effects if limit criteria of preceding 'if' or 'else_if' is not met | [Expand] | none |   
else_if | Executes enclosed effects if limit criteria of preceding 'if' or 'else_if' is not met, and its own limit is met | [Expand] | none |   
enable_religion | enable/disable a religion |   | religion |   
end_mission | The country scope ends its currently active mission. If set yes, it will complete it, otherwise it will abort the mission. |   | country |   
end_parliament | End the current parliament session. If set 'yes', pass the issue, if set 'no' then fail the issue instead. |   | country, international_organization |   
end_situation | End a situation |   | none | situation
end_vote | Sets the final winning vote for a resolution. | end_vote = { resolution = <resolution> vote = <vote> } | international_organization, situation |   
error_log | Log a string to the error log when this effect executes, error_log = message, the message can be a localization string with ROOT, SCOPE and PREV available |   | none |   
estate_add_gold | Changes the gold of an estate |   | estate |
