random_war | Iterate through all wars going on globally | random_war = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | none | war
random_war_participant | Iterate through all participants of a war | random_war_participant = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | war | country
random_weather_system_in_location | Iterate through all weather systems in a location | random_weather_system_in_location = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | location | weather_system
random_west_of_province_definition | Iterate through all province-definitions west of a province-definition | random_west_of_province_definition = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | province_definition | province_definition
random_work_of_art | Iterate through all WorkOfArts in the world | random_work_of_art = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | none | work_of_art
random_work_of_art_by_creator | Iterate through all work_of_art by a particular artist | random_work_of_art_by_creator = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | character | work_of_art
random_work_of_art_in_country | Iterate through all work_of_art in a country | random_work_of_art_in_country = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | country | work_of_art
random_work_of_art_in_location | Iterate through all work_of_art in a location | random_work_of_art_in_location = { limit = { <triggers> } (weight = { <mean time to happen value> }) <effects> } | location | work_of_art
remove_accepted_culture | Removes an accepted culture from a country |   | country | culture
remove_additional_migration | removes an additional migration source to a colonial charter. | remove_additional_migration = <province> | colonial_charter |   
remove_all_casus_belli | removes all casus belli on the target country |   | country | country
remove_antagonism | Removes an antagonism modifier | remove_antagonism = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
remove_avatar | removed an avatar from a country |   | country | avatar
remove_breach | removes a breach from the current siege |   | siege |   
remove_casus_belli | Removes casus_belli | remove_casus_belli = { target = x type = y <province = prov> } | country |   
remove_character_allegiance | Remove the character scope from the rebel group they are part of. |   | character |   
remove_character_modifier | Remove a modifier from a character | remove_character_modifier = name | character |   
remove_colonial_claim | Removed the colonial claim in the target province_definition |   | none | province_definition
remove_commander | removes the target character from his unit |   | none | character
remove_cooldown | Removes a cooldown for a country or international organization. | remove_cooldown = <cooldown_token> | country, international_organization |   
remove_core | makes the location no longer a core of the target country |   | location | country
remove_country_from_international_organization | removes a country from an international organization |   | international_organization | country
remove_country_modifier | Remove a modifier from a country | remove_country_modifier = name | country |   
remove_enemy_from_international_organization | removes a country from an international organization |   | international_organization | country
remove_extended_winter | Removed extended winter to target area |   | none | area
remove_from_cabinet | Removes the character from the cabinet |   | country | character
remove_from_international_organization | remove a location from an international organization |   | location | international_organization
remove_location_modifier | Remove a modifier from a location | remove_location_modifier = name | location |   
remove_mercenary_modifier | Remove a modifier from a mercenary | remove_mercenary_modifier = name | mercenary |   
remove_merchant_power | Removes temporary power to a merchant | remove_merchant_power = { country = <country> key = localisation } | market |   
remove_migration | removes a migration | [Expand] | none |   
remove_opinion | Removes an opinion modifier | remove_opinion = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
remove_policy | Remove a policy from a country. |   | country | policy
remove_religious_aspect | removed a religious_aspect from a country |   | country | religious_aspect
remove_religious_focus | Remove a completed religious focus from the country scope |   | country | religious_focus
remove_rival | removes target country as a rival |   | country | country
remove_ruler | Removes the character as ruler from the target country |   | character | country
remove_temporary_demand | Remove a temporary demand in a market |   | market | demand
remove_tolerated_culture | Removes an Tolerated culture from a country |   | country | culture
remove_trait | removes a trait to a character |   | character | trait
remove_traits_of_category | Removes all traits of a specified category. Supports the categories: ruler, general, admiral, artist, explorer, child, religious_figure |   | character |   
remove_truce_with | Removes the truce with the target country |   | country | country
remove_trust | Removes a trust modifier | remove_trust = { modifier = <modifier_name> target = Z scale = {script value} } | country |   
remove_unit_modifier | Remove a modifier from a unit | remove_unit_modifier = name | unit |   
remove_variable | Removes a variable | remove_variable = variable_name | none |   
remove_vfx | Removes VFX effects on the map |   | location |   
save_scope_as | Saves the current scope as an arbitrarily-named target to be referenced later in the (unbroken) event chain | save_scope_as = <string> | none |   
save_scope_value_as | Saves a numerical or bool value as an arbitrarily-named target to be referenced later in the (unbroken) event chain | save_scope_value_as = { name = <string> value = x } | none |   
save_temporary_scope_as | Saves the current scope as an arbitrarily-named temporary target to be referenced later in the same effect | save_temporary_scope_as = <string> | none |   
set_automated_system | Activate or deactivate the automation of a system for one country. Will only have an effect if this country is played or will be played by a player. | [Expand] | country |   
set_bankruptcy | Make the country either bankrupt if set to yes, or get it out of its current bankruptcy if set to no. |   | country |   
set_capital | Sets the target location as capital of the country |   | country | location
set_child_education | Set the education type of a child | set_child_education = education | character | child_education
set_collection_pin | Sets collection pin. |   | none |   
set_country_employment_system | Sets the country's employment system |   | country | employment_system
set_doom | Sets doom |   | country, international_organization |   
set_dynasty_name_type | changes dynasty to have a specific dynasty_name_type (default, location, patronym, descendant) |   | dynasty |   
set_ethnicity | Set the ethnicity of a character |   | character | ethnicity
set_first_name | Set the first name of a character to the defined string or scoped character |   | character |   
set_garrison_size | Sets the garrison size of the target location to the specified value. |   | location |   
set_global_variable | Sets a variable | [Expand] | none |   
set_gold | Sets gold |   | country, international_organization |   
set_government_power | Sets government power |   | country, international_organization |   
set_harmony | Sets Harmony |   | country, international_organization |   
set_honor | Sets honor |   | country, international_organization |   
set_horde_unity | Sets horde_unity |   | country, international_organization |   
set_inflation | Sets inflation |   | country, international_organization |   
set_karma | Sets karma |   | country, international_organization |   
set_leader_country | set the leader country of an international organization |   | international_organization | country
set_legitimacy | Sets legitimacy |   | country, international_organization |   
set_participated_in_parliament | Mark the country as having participated in the parliament of the target international organization. Is automatically set when a country votes in a parliament which has the resolution. |   | country | international_organization
set_prestige | Sets prestige |   | country, international_organization |   
set_purity | Sets purity |   | country, international_organization |   
set_regent | Makes the target_character the acting regent |   | country | character
set_religious_influence | Sets religious influence |   | country, international_organization |   
set_religious_school | Sets the religious_school to the target school |   | country | religious_school
set_religious_view | Sets the Religious view of target. | set_religious_view = { target = x value = relation_level } | religion |   
set_republican_tradition | Sets republican_tradition |   | country, international_organization |   
set_revolution | Make the country either revolutionary if set to yes, or get remove its revoutionary status if set to no. |   | country |   
set_revolution_target | Make the country to the target of the revolution if set to yes, or remove it when set to no. |   | country |   
set_righteousness | Sets Righteousness |   | country, international_organization |   
set_rite_power | Sets rite power |   | country, international_organization |   
set_sailors | Sets sailors |   | country, international_organization |   
set_school_opinion | Sets the school_opinion of target. | set_school_opinion = { target = x value = relation_level } | religious_school |   
set_self_control | Sets Self Control |   | country, international_organization |   
set_societal_value | Sets societal value |   | country |   
set_stability | Sets stability |   | country, international_organization |   
set_subsidized | change whether a building is subsidised or not |   | building |   
set_to_limited_random_stat | Sets the stats of the character scope to a random value between a min and max value. | set_to_limited_random_stat = { ability = adm/dip/mil max = <scripted value> min = <scripted value> } | character |   
set_tribal_cohesion | Sets tribal_cohesion |   | country, international_organization |   
set_tutorial_var | Sets tutorial var. |   | none |   
set_unit_size | Sets the number of people in each subunit in the Unit to the given percentage of maximum |   | unit |   
set_variable | Sets a variable | [Expand] | none |   
set_vote | Sets the vote for a country on a resolution in an international organization or situation. | set_vote = { voter = <country> resolution = <resolution> vote = <whatever> [locked = yes/no] } | international_organization, situation |   
set_war_exhaustion | Sets WarExhaustion |   | country, international_organization |   
set_yanantin | Sets yanantin |   | country, international_organization |   
show_as_tooltip | Enclosed effects are only shown in tooltips (but are not actually executed) | show_as_tooltip = { <more_effects> } | none |   
sort_global_variable_list | Sorts a variable list | sort_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> order = <script_value> } | none |   
sort_local_variable_list | Sorts a variable list | sort_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> order = <script_value> } | none |   
sort_variable_list | Sorts a variable list | sort_variable_list = { name = <variable_name> order = <script_value> } | none |   
spawn_army_levy_unit | Spawn an army levy unit for the target country in the current location scope |   | none | country
spawn_disease | Spawns a disease in a location or on a subunit. | spawn_disease = { disease = <disease> value = <script_value> } | location | disease_outbreak
spawn_navy_levy_unit | Spawn a navy levy unit for the target country in the current location scope |   | none | country
split_pop | Splits a pop and makes changes to it. If both size and fraction are scripted, it will use the largest. | [Expand] | pop |   
stall_exploration | enable/disable stall on exploration |   | exploration |   
start_civil_war | Make the rebels rise up against the country, starting a civil war. Has no effect if the country is already in a civil war. Will scope immediately into the rebel country tag. |   | rebels | country
start_conquistador | Creates a new conquistador in the current country | [Expand] | country |   
start_exploration | Creates a new exploration in the current country | start_exploration = { area = <area> character = <character> price = <price> price_modifier = <number> } | country |   
start_mission | The country starts immediately the specified mission. Will not do anything if a mission is active already. | start_mission = { mission = <mission_scope> [optional any parameters to pass in, eg target = x] } | country |   
start_periphora_towards | Starts a periphora towards the target location. Art will move towards the destination slowly in a procession. |   | work_of_art | location
start_revolt | Make the rebels rise up against the country in the form of a revolt. |   | rebels |   
start_trade | Starts a trade | start_trade = { type = <trade_type> target = <country> } | country |   
start_union | Starts a union | start_union = { target = <country> } | country |   
start_vote | Starts a vote on a resolution in an international organization or situation. | start_vote = { resolution = <resolution> } | international_organization, situation |   
start_war | Starts a war | start_war = { target = <country> type = <war_type> } | country |   
start_work_of_art | Starts the creation of a work of art | start_work_of_art = { type = <work_of_art_type> } | country |   
support_rebel | scope country starts supporting the target rebel |   | country | rebels
switch | Executes effects based on a switch value | switch = { trigger = <trigger> <case> = { <effects> } } | none |   
take_loan | Takes a loan | take_loan = { amount = gold interest = percent months = months } | country | loan
transfer_occupation | Transfers the occupation of the current location to the target country |   | location | country
transfer_trade_power | Transfers trade power | transfer_trade_power = { target = <country> amount = <script_value> } | country |   
trigger_event | Triggers an event | trigger_event = { id = <event_id> days/weeks/months/years = <script_value> } | none |   
unite | Unites the current country with the target country | unite = { target = <country> } | country |   
update_market | Updates the market |   | market |   
update_price | Updates the price of a good | update_price = { good = <good> price = <script_value> } | market |   
validate_government | Validates the government |   | country |   
validate_laws | Validates the laws |   | country |   
validate_policies | Validates the policies |   | country |   
validate_religious_aspects | Validates the religious aspects |   | country |   
validate_religious_focuses | Validates the religious focuses |   | country |   
validate_societal_values | Validates the societal values |   | country |   

======================
END OF FULL EFFECTS LIST
======================
